Question: ErgoAV CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
ErgoAV

ErgoFx Standing Desk

- Best-in-class lift columns for seamless adjustment
- Integrated Wireless Phone Charger with automatic lift and swivel
- LED-lit Front Fast Charging Panel with 100W max power and USB ports
- Concealed Power Supply Compartment with integrated 120-volt AC 5 outlet power strip
- Monitor Desk Mount with Docking Station for connectivity and productivity
- Motion Mounts with advanced IsoTILT™ technology for versatile TV angles
- Compatible with TVs from 39”-98”+
- Visit ErgoAV at CES 2024 in the Venetian Expo, Booth #51952
